name: ufo party
description:
CONTROLS:
Arrow Keys / WASD - Menus
Z / Spacebar - Selects button
---
Arrow Keys / WASD - Moves the player
Z / Spacebar - Activates the beam

-

ufo party is a game where you control a ufo and destroy everything. each thing you destroy adds up to the total cost of damages. destroy everything, collect everything, and get the highest score.

i started working on this game back in february 2020, which is a little over a year ago now. it was initially just some sort of practice to get a feel for using Unity, and the more i worked on it, it became a lot more ambitious (for me). after lots of months of school and just plain procrastination, i finally managed to get it into a playable state. there may be some bugs and oversights that i missed, but it works!

some past development logs about the game can be found at this website right here.

any bugs you find and suggestions you may have can be written down in the comments section.

thank you to codeman38 for the great font! and thank you to my friends and family! it's not really even a fully-fledged game (more of a practice, really), but whatever!!
